name: Drink Or Not?
description:
Welcome To The Bar

We operate a little differently to other establishments. Instead of just serving drinks for you to buy we serve a variety of things in glasses. It is up to you to decide if they are drinks or not.

Different things will be served up to you and you will have to decide if they are drinks or not.

Check out the DevLog for the game here: https://youtu.be/iBmdKUCLumM
